QuestData.Title: Warchief's Command: Valley of the Four Winds!
QuestData.Description:
All able-bodied members of the Horde are hereby ordered to report to Chen Stormstout in the Valley of the Four Winds.
The adventuring spirit of the Stormstouts is something that the Horde can learn from.
Travel with the Stormstouts and discover what secrets Pandaria holds.
For the Horde!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Chen Stormstout in the Valley of the Four Winds.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Chen Stormstout in the Valley of the Four Winds.
